title: 2 blocks one with electric force probe

content.prompt: On a straight horizontal track along which blocks can slide with negligible friction, block 1 slides toward block 2, which is initially at rest. Block 1 collides with an electronic force probe attached to block 2, generating a force vs. time graph and causing block 2 to start sliding. What additional measurements must be made to determine the momentum of block 2 after the collision?

choices.label: The post-collision speed of block 2 only
Both the mass and the post-collision speed of block 1

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
